{{cpp/title|{{small|generator&lt;Ref,V,Allocator&gt;::promise_type::}}get_return_object}}
{{cpp/coroutine/generator/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|
std::generator get_return_object() noexcept;
}}

Returns a {{lt|cpp/coroutine/generator}} object whose member {{lti|cpp/coroutine/generator#Data members|coroutine_}} is obtained via the expression {{c|std::coroutine_handle&lt;promise_type&gt;::from_promise(*this)}},
and whose member {{lti|cpp/coroutine/generator#Data members|active_}} points to an empty stack.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The {{lt|cpp/coroutine/generator}} object.
